name: strand-button
description: A fully-styled primary and secondary button.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Sets the type of styling which is applied to the button.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Sets the visual state to 'selected'. Ideal for use in scenario where it may be necessary to toggle the button's visual state (see: strand-group).

attributes.name: fitparent
attributes.description: Sets the width of the component to fill the width of it's parent element.

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description: Sets the layout of the button, used to style strand-buttons which appears in a grouping scenario (see: strand-group).

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Sets the visual and interaction state to be disabled.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: instructs the component to be displayed at a predetermined size (i.e. - 'normal' or 'large')
